SEARCH
Package chess.logic.board

Class Board.Builder

java.lang.Object
chess.logic.board.Board.Builder
Enclosing class:
Board
public static class Board.Builder extends Object
Represents a builder for creating a Board object with a custom configuration of pieces. This class allows setting pieces, move maker, and transition move before building the board.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Builder()
    Constructs a new Builder object with an empty initial board configuration.

      public Board build()
      Builds a new Board object based on the current builder configuration.
